articles.description: Warriors coach Steve Kerr wants the NCAA and the NBA to work together to provide options to players who leave college early but go undrafted, including allowing them to return to school.
articles.headline: Steve Kerr: 'Let's do what's best for the kid'

articles.description: Mike Golic questions if Memphis coach Tubby Smith should publicly oppose players having the liberty to transfer schools since coaches change jobs with impunity.
articles.headline: Are Tubby Smith's transfer comments tone-deaf?

images.caption: Mike Golic questions if Memphis coach Tubby Smith should publicly oppose players having the liberty to transfer schools since coaches change jobs with impunity.
images.name: Are Tubby Smith's transfer comments tone-deaf?

articles.description: What will NBA decision-makers be watching most closely this week, and who has the most at stake? ESPN's draft experts break down top prospects in the conference tournaments.
articles.headline: NBA draft prospects with the most at stake in conference tourneys

images.caption: What will NBA scouts be looking for if MIchael Porter Jr. plays?
images.name: Michael Porter [608x342] - Copy

articles.description: March can get confusing. We're here to help. Want to sound smart? We've got the players to watch and the proper way to pronounce those hard-to-say names. Want to avoid disaster? Avoid these teams and these menu items for your viewing party.
articles.headline: The ultimate guide to get your through all the madness of March

images.caption: Landry Shamet can shoot it. You'll want to keep an eye on him -- and the Shockers -- this March.
images.credit: Travis Heying/The Wichita Eagle via AP
images.name: Landry Shamet [608x342]

images.caption: Ready to get behind this up-and-down Kentucky team? Good luck with that.
images.name: John Calipari [608x342]

images.caption: Don't get fancy. Just serve some pizzas at your NCAA tournament party and everything will be OK.
images.name: Pizza [608x342]

images.caption: Most people know Marvin Bagley III. Now, start dropping Wendell Carter Jr.'s name on people, that will impress them.
images.name: Wendell Carter Jr. [608x342]

articles.description: There's still time to play your way into the NCAA tournament. And time to play your way out. Time for a look at which teams -- and leagues -- have the most at stake during Champ Week.
articles.headline: Champ Week primer: Which teams and leagues have the most at stake?

images.caption: Bonzie Colson is back, and his return makes Notre Dame a different team. But does it make the Fighting Irish an NCAA tournament team?
images.name: Bonzie Colson [608x342]

images.caption: Can Collin Sexton and the Crimson Tide do enough this week to get into the NCAA tournament field?
images.name: Collin100.jpg [608x342]

articles.description: Penn State and Nebraska might have squandered their opportunity in the Big Ten tournament. For bubble aspirants such as Oklahoma State, Notre Dame and Utah, Champ Week presents a now-or-never proposition.
articles.headline: Bubble Watch: It's a one-game season for tourney hopefuls

images.caption: Louisville needs a win over Florida State in the ACC tournament.
images.name: Dwayne Sutton [576x324]

images.caption: Two wins over Kansas puts Oklahoma State in the bubble conversation.
images.name: Kendall Smith [576x324]
